We recap the complexity classes P, NP, NP-complete, NP-hard. We also show the following reductions:

a) From 3SAT to Independent Set
b) From 3SAT to 3-Coloring
c) From 3SAT to 3-Dimensional Matching
d) From 3-Dimensional Matching to Subset Sum
